name: Re-Cycle Boy
description:
CONTROLS: WASD to move and SPACEBAR to shoot bike grappling hook.

A game called Re-Cycle Boy, made for Wanna Yam Game Jam.  Still in Alpha, will be updating frequently. Next update will have enemies like cars and skateboarders.

The game is inspired by the retro classic with similar name "Paper Boy". You must collect all bins in the neighbor hood in the fastest time to get on top of the Leaderboard with the most cash.

Total Cash is calculated by (bins collected / seconds) x 100
